overview: Hoon-i who had been farming in the countryside for more than forty years, has Dal-rae in his mind. Eventually, the two got into a relationship but ended up wasting each other's time due to their incompatibility. Meanwhile, Hoon-i's best friend Sang-woo is also thirsty for marriage and tries international marriage twice, but is often rejected because of his big thing. It just so happened that Hoon-i had a crush on Sang-woo's second partner, Alisa, and came up with an amazing idea that would blow away each of their dilemmas...
title: Rice Paddy Elf
